column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday March 8 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-64W in Franklin Co:
column4: I-64W is closed near the 51.5 MM until approximately 3 p.m. due to bridge deck repair work at the bridge over Cardwell Ln.

column3: Traffic Alert for I-64W in Franklin Co:
column4: Detour: Exit 53B -> US-127N -> US-60W -> KY-151 -> back to I-64W.
Expect increased congestion in the downtown area.
Use added caution and watch for pedestrians.
